bio: Atul is the estranged wife of a mercenary named Dumrag gro-Morrg. Atul and Dumrag are both Orcs. She wears fine clothing and carries a iron dagger. She no longer loves her husband Dumrag, and is now in love with a Breton nobleman named Simund Gautierre. As their affair progressed, Simund staged an incident in which it Dumrag was fooled into thinking Atul was kidnapped by bandits, but she has been secretly been living with Simund in his manor, in a remote locatoin east of the city of Bruma. Atul now wants to never see Dumrag again and will avoid him at all costs.
name: Atul
